name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Soft paneer cubes simmered in a rich creamy tomato-butter gravy with mild Indian spices.

name: Dal Makhani
description: Slow-cooked black lentils blended with cream and butter, a Punjabi favorite.

name: Shahi Paneer
description: Cottage cheese cooked in royal cashew and cream gravy with subtle saffron flavors.

name: Kadai Paneer
description: Paneer tossed with bell peppers and onions in freshly ground Indian spices.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tandoori chicken cooked in buttery tomato sauce, creamy and flavorful.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken tikka pieces simmered in spicy, tangy tomato masala gravy.

name: Chole (Punjabi Style)
description: Spicy chickpeas cooked with onions, tomatoes, and traditional Punjabi spices.

name: Rajma Masala
description: Red kidney beans slow-cooked in thick tomato gravy with aromatic spices.

name: Malai Kofta
description: Paneer and potato dumplings stuffed with dry fruits in a creamy cashew gravy.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: Tender mutton pieces slow-cooked in a rich, aromatic Kashmiri-style curry.

name: Butter Naan
description: Soft, fluffy naan brushed with melted butter.

name: Garlic Naan
description: Crispy clay oven naan topped with minced garlic and coriander.

name: Tandoori Roti
description: Whole wheat roti roasted in traditional tandoor, light and crisp.

name: Jeera Rice
description: Fragrant basmati rice tempered with cumin seeds and clarified butter.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Long-grain basmati rice layered with vegetables, saffron, and aromatic spices.

name: Boondi Raita
description: Refreshing yogurt with crispy boondi, spiced with roasted cumin and mint.

name: Gulab Jamun (2 pcs)
description: Soft, deep-fried khoya balls soaked in warm sugar syrup.

name: Sweet Lassi
description: Chilled yogurt-based drink blended with sugar and a hint of rose essence.
